directions: Combine plums, cherries, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 tablespoon oil, and a pinch of salt in a medium bowl. Scrape in seeds from vanilla bean (reserve pod for another use) or add vanilla extract; toss to combine. Let macerate just until fruit begins to release juices, 10-15 minutes.
Meanwhile, whisk ricotta and remaining 1 tablespoon sugar in a medium bowl until smooth.
Drizzle toast with oil, spread with ricotta mixture, and top with fruit. Drizzle with more oil, if desired, and juices from bowl. Sprinkle with salt.
ingredients: 2 red plums or nectarines, halved, pitted, thinly sliced
1 tablespoon olive oil plus more for drizzling
1/4 vanilla bean, split lengthwise, or 1/2 teaspoon pure vanilla extract
title: Cherry and Plum Bruschetta
